categories.description: From chicken pickin’ slapback to ethereal reverb to keep you drowning in inspiration for days on end.

items.name: Slöer Stereo Ambient Reverb
items.description: The Slöer Stereo Ambient Reverb provides lush, atmospheric reverb with deep ambient textures. Explore the sonic landscapes with this versatile pedal.

items.name: Fable Granular Soundscape Generator
items.description: The Fable Granular Soundscape Generator creates immersive soundscapes using granular synthesis. Get lost in a world of unique sonic possibilities.

items.name: Melee Wall of Noise
items.description: The Melee: Wall of Noise pedal is a powerful distortion unit that brings a wall of crushing sound to your setup. Perfect for heavy riffing and lead playing.

items.name: ARP-87 Multi-Function Delay
items.description: The ARP-87 Multi-Function Delay features four delay modes and a unique X knob for versatile sound shaping. An essential tool for creative delay effects.

items.name: D1 High-Fidelity Stereo Delay
items.description: The D1 High-Fidelity Stereo Delay offers studio-grade delay effects with pristine audio quality. Experience rich and warm delay tones in stereo.

items.name: Descent Reverb & Octave Machine
items.description: The Descent Reverb/Octave Machine combines reverb and octave effects to create immersive ambient textures. Dive into lush sonic landscapes.

items.name: Fathom Multi-Function Reverb
items.description: The Fathom Multi-Function Reverb offers a variety of reverb algorithms with deep editing capabilities. Create your dream reverbs.

items.name: Lore Reverse Soundscape Generator
items.description: The Lore Reverse Soundscape Generator creates ethereal reverse delay effects and otherworldly sounds. Unlock hidden dimensions of sound.

items.name: R1 High-Fidelity Stereo Reverb
items.description: The R1 High-Fidelity Stereo Reverb offers rich, natural reverb with detailed sound shaping. Elevate your sound to new heights.

items.name: Slö Multi Texture Reverb
items.description: The Slö Multi Texture Reverb combines three algorithms to provide lush, dreamy reverb tones. Create ambient soundscapes with ease.

items.name: Slötvå Multi Texture Reverb
items.description: The Slötvå Multi Texture Reverb offers a variety of reverb modes with deep sound sculpting options. Dive into the depths of ambient sound.

categories.category: AMP & Cab Sim, Compression, Boost, and EQ Pedals
categories.description: Explore a variety of amp and cab simulation, compression, boost, and EQ pedals to enhance your tone.

items.name: ACS1 Amp & Cab Simulator
items.description: The ACS1 Amp + Cab Simulator emulates the sound of various amplifiers and speaker cabinets. Get authentic amp tones in a compact pedal.

items.name: Badwater Bass Pre-Amp & D.I.
items.description: The Badwater Bass Pre-Amp & D.I. offers powerful bass tone shaping and direct recording capabilities. Perfect for bass players on the go.

items.name: Deep Six Compressor
items.description: The Deep Six Compressor provides transparent compression and sustain for your guitar signal. Tame your dynamics and enhance your tone.

items.name: EB-10 Preamp & EQ & Boost
items.description: The EB-10 Preamp // EQ // Boost offers versatile tone shaping with a built-in EQ and boost. Perfect for enhancing your guitar's sound.

items.name: Emissary Parallel Boost
items.description: The Emissary Parallel Boost provides a clean, transparent boost to push your tone further. Keep your original tone intact while boosting the output.

items.name: Mira Optical Compressor
items.description: The Mira Optical Compressor delivers smooth and natural compression to even out your guitar's dynamics. Enhance sustain and balance your sound.

categories.description: Find your perfect overdrive, fuzz, or distortion pedal for every style and genre.

items.name: Eons Five-State Fuzz
items.description: The Eons Five-State Fuzz provides versatile fuzz tones with five selectable modes. Unleash gritty and expressive fuzz sounds.

items.name: Eras Five-State Distortion
items.description: The Eras Five-State Distortion offers five distinct distortion flavors to match your playing style. From mild to high-gain, it has it all.

items.name: Ages Five-State Overdrive
items.description: The Ages Five-State Overdrive features five overdrive circuits for various clipping options. Sculpt your tone with this versatile pedal.

items.name: Melee: Wall of Noise
items.description: The Melee: Wall of Noise pedal is a powerful distortion unit that brings a wall of crushing sound to your setup. Perfect for heavy riffing and lead playing.

items.name: Warhorn Mid-Range Overdrive
items.description: The Warhorn Mid-Range Overdrive offers warm and articulate overdrive tones with a strong mid-range focus. Cut through the mix with ease.

items.name: Voyager Preamp & Overdrive
items.description: The Voyager Preamp/Overdrive combines preamp and overdrive capabilities to shape your guitar's tone. A versatile tool for all styles.

items.name: 385 Overdrive
items.description: The 385 Overdrive delivers a smooth and creamy overdrive with vintage-style tones. Perfect for adding warmth and character to your sound.

items.name: Iron Horse Distortion
items.description: The Iron Horse Distortion provides a wide range of distortion tones, from classic to modern. An essential tool for heavy distortion lovers.

items.name: Janus Fuzz/Tremolo
items.description: The Janus Fuzz/Tremolo combines fuzz and tremolo effects for unique and pulsating sounds. Experiment with wild textures and rhythms.

items.name: Jupiter Multi-Clip Fuzz
items.description: The Jupiter Multi-Clip Fuzz features various clipping options for a diverse fuzz palette. Roar with vintage or modern fuzz tones.

items.name: Kangra Filter Fuzz
items.description: The Kangra Filter Fuzz blends fuzz and envelope filter for dynamic and expressive sounds. Unleash funky and psychedelic tones.

categories.description: Expand your tonal horizons with a range of modulation and octave pedals to create unique sounds.

items.name: Descent Reverb & Octave
items.description: The Descent Reverb/Octave pedal offers lush reverb and octave effects for ambient soundscapes and experimental tones.

items.name: Julia Analog Chorus & Vibrato
items.description: The Julia Analog Chorus/Vibrato pedal provides lush and warm chorus or pulsating vibrato effects for beautiful modulation.

items.name: Julianna Deluxe Chorus & Vibrato
items.description: The Julianna Deluxe Chorus/Vibrato pedal delivers a versatile modulation experience with rich chorus and dynamic vibrato effects.

items.name: Kangra Filter Fuzz
items.description: The Kangra Filter Fuzz blends fuzz and envelope filter for dynamic and expressive sounds. Unleash funky and psychedelic tones.

items.name: Lillian Multi-Stage Analog Phaser
items.description: The Lillian Multi-Stage Analog Phaser offers a wide range of phaser effects with four- and six-stage options for modulation exploration.

items.name: Luminary Quad Octave Generator
items.description: The Luminary Quad Octave Generator produces lush octave sounds, from classic to experimental, for innovative musical textures.

items.name: MAKO Series: M1 High-Fidelity Modulation Machine
items.description: The MAKO Series: M1 High-Fidelity Modulation Machine offers high-quality modulation effects with precise control over various parameters.

items.name: Monument Harmonic Tap Tremolo
items.description: The Monument Harmonic Tap Tremolo provides harmonic-rich tremolo sounds with tap tempo for rhythmic precision.

items.name: Polychrome Analog Flanger
items.description: The Polychrome Analog Flanger delivers classic flanger tones with vintage warmth and a wide range of modulation effects.

categories.description: Explore the foundation of tone with our collection of fundamental pedals.

items.name: Fundamental Chorus
items.description: The Fundamental Chorus pedal offers classic chorus effects for adding depth and dimension to your sound.

items.name: Fundamental Delay
items.description: The Fundamental Delay pedal provides delay effects with adjustable parameters for versatile and atmospheric tones.

items.name: Fundamental Reverb
items.description: The Fundamental Reverb pedal delivers lush reverb effects to add space and ambiance to your playing.

items.name: Fundamental Distortion
items.description: The Fundamental Distortion pedal provides distortion effects to add grit and overdrive to your tone.

items.name: Fundamental Drive
items.description: The Fundamental Drive pedal offers smooth overdrive effects for expressive and dynamic playing.

items.name: Fundamental Fuzz
items.description: The Fundamental Fuzz pedal delivers classic fuzz tones for a wide range of musical styles.

items.name: Fundamental Tremolo
items.description: The Fundamental Tremolo pedal provides versatile tremolo effects for rhythmic and pulsating sounds.

items.name: Fundamental Phaser
items.description: The Fundamental Phaser pedal offers classic phaser effects for adding movement and texture to your tone.
